name: Unite Against Them
description:
As king and wearer of the mythical Golden Armor, rally your troops and fight against the oppression of the demonfolk! Puzzle your way through 8 unique levels and pit your brains against their brawn.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • R or F5 to reset a level.
  • P to pause.
  • F2 to go back to the main menu.
  • Alt + Enter or F4 to toggle fullscreen.
  • Escape to exit.

Made for the #BrackeysGameJam 2021.1

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
